body:
Hello dear spack users.
I am new in spack.
I have spack installed in centos 7, using as my local environment to install packages using spack. I have many installed already. But for tecplot, I downloaded the source file and copied it to the tecplot directory. Once I run spack install tecplot, it return error during the install. Bellow is the error I am getting. 
=> 10365: tecplot: Executing phase: 'install'
==> [2020-06-02-20:15:51.036954, 10373] FILTER FILE: /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-tecplot-2017r1-ppqvoq3pgapsrxvox4wktnu23shjcwyo/spack-src/tecplot360ex2017r1_linux64.sh [replacing "interactive=TRUE"]
==> [2020-06-02-20:16:02.808306, 10373] FILTER FILE: /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-tecplot-2017r1-ppqvoq3pgapsrxvox4wktnu23shjcwyo/spack-src/tecplot360ex2017r1_linux64.sh [replacing "cpack_skip_license=FALSE"]
==> [2020-06-02-20:16:13.715772, 10373] '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-tecplot-2017r1-ppqvoq3pgapsrxvox4wktnu23shjcwyo/spack-src/tecplot360ex2017r1_linux64.sh' '--prefix=/opt/aci/sw/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-8.3.1/tecplot-2017r1'
Tecplot 360 EX Installer Version: , Copyright (c) Tecplot, Inc.
This is a self-extracting archive.
Using target directory: [/opt/aci/sw/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-8.3.1/tecplot-2017r1]
Extracting, please wait...


gzip: stdin: invalid compressed data--format violated
tar: Unexpected EOF in archive
tar: Unexpected EOF in archive
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now
Problem unpacking the tecplot360ex2017r1_linux64.sh

I don't have a disk space problem.
I also executed the source file alone and the source file has no problem.
Please any help will be appreciated
title: tecplot failed to install
